items.title: Taverncast 62 - Temporal Anomaly
items.author: Taverncast
items.content:encoded: Taverncast tosses around the age old topic: time travel!  Where would you go?  Why would you go? Also, Bryce has customer service issues, and Mike buys a dog.

image.title: Taverncast - Happy Hour in Your Head - Since 2005

feed.title: Taverncast - Happy Hour in Your Head - Since 2005
feed.description: Order a beer, pull up a seat and join your friends at Taverncast for our patented un-scripted roundtable discussions, covering a wide range of topics with a unique wit and inviting style - all blended together, it's Happy Hour in Your Head!

itunes.author: Bryce Erwin, Bill Ticknor, Michelle O'Neill, Mike Monan, Aric Watson, Jennifer Albrecht, Lauren Hoban and Derek Chew
itunes.subtitle: Beer - Talk - Fun.  It's Happy Hour in Your Head!
